TextBody:
Hello,

Can you please check if the computer is selected in the policy named Duplicate VPub?
Also, please check if the mp4 file type is set to be blocked or allowed.

Kind regards
__________________
Andrei Pop | Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Endpoint Protector

TextBody:
Hello,

Can you please check if the computer is selected in the policy named Duplicate VPub?
Also, please check if the mp4 file type is set to be blocked or allowed in the denylist and allowlist.

Kind regards
__________________
Andrei Pop | Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Endpoint Protector

On Mon, Mar 31, 2025 at 4:53 PM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:

Hello Swami,

I wanted to check in regarding your support ticket 00439700. We haven’t heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need assistance with this issue.

If you’re still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the ticket on my end.

Please feel free to reply to this email with any updates or questions. We’re here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products.

Ticket Number: 00439700
Ticket Subject: Downloads of media files are blocked via Chrome browser to a network share
Ticket Details: To whom it may concern,

Hi, we are facing a problem with the DLP product on one system. The system is unable to download files directly to a network mounted drive via the chrome browser, when using firefox it is working as expected. The CAP report is mentioning that the file types are blocked as a content threat, we have not configured any content aware policies to block downloads of content nor blocking content movement over network shares. This is affecting only one system as of now.

Requesting your guidance and support on this

Regards,
Swami Purnamsha

Thank you!

Andrei Pop
Technical Support Engineer
